t = input()
for i in range(t):
    candles = map(int, raw_input().split())
    smallest = min(candles[1:])
    index = candles.index(smallest,1)
    
 
    msg = ''
    if candles[0] < smallest:
        msg = 1
        for s in xrange(candles[0]+1):
            msg *= 10
    else:
        for s in xrange(smallest+1):
            msg += str(index)
    print msg
